alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 3:34AM CDT until July 06 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... West central Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 334 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Slapout to 7 miles south of Follett to 9 miles southeast of Wolf Creek Park, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Shattuck, Arnett, Gage, Fargo, Fort Supply, and Catesby. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
